snippet: The director of the European Union’s humanitarian aid department warned on Thursday that the situation in Iraq was deteriorating rapidly while the world was preoccupied with crises elsewhere.
lead_paragraph: The director of the European Union’s humanitarian aid department warned on Thursday that the situation in Iraq was deteriorating rapidly while the world was preoccupied with crises elsewhere.

headline.main: Iraq: Bombings Follow Aid Official’s Warning
headline.print_headline: Iraq: Bombings Follow Aid Official’s Warning
